bibl.title: The Bodmer Menander and the Comic Fragments.
bibl.note: Considers the impact of the plays represented in the Bodmer codex on the interpretation of fragmentary texts. - P. 139: transcript of a comic fragment which is to appear in Oxyrhynchus Papyri. First cent. A.D.
bibl.seg: HANDLEY Eric, The Bodmer Menander and the Comic Fragments.
Eric HANDLEY et André HURST (Édd.), Relire Ménandre (Genève, 1990) pp. 123-148; - 162-166.

Considers the impact of the plays represented in the Bodmer codex on the interpretation of fragmentary texts. - P. 139: transcript of a comic fragment which is to appear in Oxyrhynchus Papyri. First cent. A.D.
